channel.title: nCoV on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in nCoV on Memo Tut

item.title: I tried to predict the infection of new type pneumonia using SIR model: ☓ Wuhan ed. ○ Hubei ed.
item.description: Recently, new pneumonia has become popular. Since I had previously conducted a study using a mathematical model of infectious disease called SIR model, I applied it to a new model of pneumonia. Mathematical models can be used to predict the future of infectious diseases. This time, we focus on Wuhan*** Hubei Province*** (provinces including Wuhan), which is the center of the outbreak, to model infectious diseases and predict the future of infectious diseases.
